content: Hi all - Alerting you we have submitted a request for deviation from US Core profile for Patient. See request here: https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-34240
Thanks for getting the request in early!

Of course! Would have done it earlier but only learned about it today :)

Tagging @Jean Duteau and @Floyd Eisenberg for awareness as well. The documentation asks us to email you, but I don't have your email addresses.
